text: Giovanni Francesco Romanelli ( born 1610Baldinucci claims the date is May 14, 1617.-1662) was an Italian painter of the Baroque style. Romanelli was an Italian painter of who trained in Rome in the workshop of Pietro da Cortona.Michael Bryan, Dictionary of painters and engravers: biographical and critical, Vol 2 (London; G. Bell and Sons, 1889), p. 400 Cortona was the leading painter of the time. ==Related pages== * List of Italian painters ==References== ==Other reading== * ==Other websites== *Artnet biography Category:17th-century Italian painters Category:1610s births Category:1662 deaths
title: Giovanni Francesco Romanelli
